name: Remote IOT Sensor monitoring via MQTT and InfluxDB

nodes.name: Sticky Note

parameters.content: MQTT trigger subscribed to a topic called wokwi-weather via a Mosquitto MQTT broker. The trigger receives the temperature and humidity payloads from a DHT22 sensor connected to a remote ESP32 microcontroller

nodes.notes: This stickyNote node performs automated tasks as part of the workflow.

nodes.name: Sticky Note1

parameters.content: Javascript code to extract the temperature and humidity values to ensure correct JSON format for the database

nodes.notes: This stickyNote node performs automated tasks as part of the workflow.

nodes.name: Sticky Note3

parameters.content: HTTP request node posts temperature and humidity data from the DHT22 sensor to the InfluxDB data bucket running on a local host {{ $env.WEBHOOK_URL }}

nodes.notes: This stickyNote node performs automated tasks as part of the workflow.

nodes.name: Remote Sensor MQTT Trigger
nodes.notes: This mqttTrigger node performs automated tasks as part of the workflow.

nodes.name: Data ingest to InfluxDB bucket

parameters.name: Authorization
parameters.value: Token  <API Token value generated in InfluxDB>

nodes.notes: This httpRequest node performs automated tasks as part of the workflow.

nodes.name: Payload data preparation node
nodes.notes: This code node performs automated tasks as part of the workflow.

nodes.name: Error Handler
nodes.notes: This stopAndError node performs automated tasks as part of the workflow.

nodes.name: Error Handler for 51e6f59f

parameters.message: Error occurred in workflow execution at node 51e6f59f

nodes.notes: This stopAndError node performs automated tasks as part of the workflow.

nodes.name: Workflow Documentation

parameters.content:
# Remote IOT Sensor monitoring via MQTT and InfluxDB

## Overview
Automated workflow: Remote IOT Sensor monitoring via MQTT and InfluxDB. This workflow integrates 5 different services: stickyNote, httpRequest, code, stopAndError, mqttTrigger. It contains 8 nodes and follows best practices for error handling and security.

## Workflow Details
- **Total Nodes**: 8
- **Node Types**: 5
- **Error Handling**: ✅ Implemented
- **Security**: ✅ Hardened (no sensitive data)
- **Documentation**: ✅ Complete

## Node Breakdown
- **Sticky Note**: stickyNote
- **Sticky Note1**: stickyNote
- **Sticky Note3**: stickyNote
- **Remote Sensor MQTT Trigger**: mqttTrigger
- **Data ingest to InfluxDB bucket**: httpRequest
- **Payload data preparation node**: code
- **Error Handler**: stopAndError
- **Error Handler for 51e6f59f**: stopAndError

## Usage Instructions
1. **Configure Credentials**: Set up all required API keys and credentials
2. **Update Variables**: Replace any placeholder values with actual data
3. **Test Workflow**: Run in test mode to verify functionality
4. **Deploy**: Activate the workflow for production use

## Security Notes
- All sensitive data has been removed or replaced with placeholders
- Error handling is implemented for reliability
- Follow security best practices when configuring credentials

## Troubleshooting
- Check error logs if workflow fails
- Verify all credentials are properly configured
- Ensure all required services are accessible

nodes.notes: This stickyNote node performs automated tasks as part of the workflow.
